Chef de Cuisine: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
Crossfire: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
Beware, It's Super Hot!: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.
